## DateApiObject.isSameYear() method

Compares whether this date is same year as provided date

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
isSameYear(date: TDate): boolean;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  date | TDate | Date which is used for comparison of same year |

<b>Returns:</b>

boolean
